item.title: Republicans Can Help Workers without Helping Unions
item.description: What America’s working class actually wants is for political leaders to pursue a pro-worker rather than a pro-union agenda.

item.title: Trump Should Swear Off Lawfare
item.description: He is right when he touts success as the best form of vengeance.

item.title: Paying for Trump Tax Cuts with Trump Tariffs Doesn’t Make Sense
item.description: Tariffs may make for a good campaign sound bite, but they make for terrible international relations and even worse economic policy.

item.title: Qatar’s Corrupt Anti-Corruption Initiative
item.description: Glamorous awards and high-profile conferences are not enough to absolve the nation of its sins.

item.title: Assad’s Atrocities
item.description: A political prisoner who served 43 years is just one of many horror stories emerging in Syria.
